name: Andrea Nagy
description: is a hormonal gymnastics, nutritionist, and life coach. She got introduced to professional eating, AVIVA gymnastics, and other movements and lifestyle systems after a sedentary lifestyle took a toll on her health. The considerable improvement in the quality of her personal life has inspired her to share the benefits of these activities with others and empower them to good health.
